title: Please Please Please remove Mark/ Poro ball from aram
body: Every single game mark engages by assassins and tanks and squishes get popped. It was a novelty on the poro king game-mode but this has just gotten old. It only buffs assassins and tanks who can start fights incredible easily and guess what happens when you don't get those type of champs on you simply lose. They need to be removed and aram returned to what it once was.

It's only ARAM. It doesn't mean anything. The gamemode is there simply for fun.

EDIT: It's pretty easy to dodge.. it doesn't have a massive hitbox therefore you should be able to dodge it, or wait til they use it and then use Flash or if you have an ability such as Graves E, use it after they've popped the second half of Mark, problem solved :)

although another point is as you might guess it really really REALLY depends on your team. in fact 10 whole champs in such a small space, whats more important than how you play, is how everyone else plays. in this mode individual skill level is pretty diluted. what every single person does will highly impact how the game is, much more than on the rift

an example in the case we're talking about. if you're sivir and you're really wanting dat single lane farm that isnt important at all, you're gonna wanna QW every wave and push up to the tower. if the rest of your team is smart enough to know overextending is bad.....thats too bad....waves pushed cos of your teammate, nobody wants to stand around near their tower with their dicks in their hand, everyones gonna go and pressure the enemy under their tower. now you might be mlg pro korean juker of the year 2015, but then if your teammate gets caught by a darius mark he just gave him an entrance into the whole team. then the rest of their team can follow up and you're all dead cos darius is disgustingly broken on aram.

point is you should know the possibilities of the shits that are able to go down nam saiyan, what you're capable of, what the enemies capable of, what your teammates are capable of, the better you can predict the better your champ can work for your team

Please Please Please remove flash from summoners rift 5v5, when i try to run away from someone without a dash ability they can still flash and kill me.
having flash only buffs those champs without dash abilities and takes away the advantage of having a dash.

Take ignite away too, its unfair to reduce heals, its a huge disadvantage to squishes that need heals from their supports.

WTF is teleport, why even go shen/tf now when you can have their ultimates as a summoners, gg unfair it takes away their advantage 

Clarity? what if i play gnar? thats unfair that certain champs cant even use some summoner spells, wtf riot.

Barrier is broken too, it just means that champs who don't have shields can have one, huge buff to them plz remove.

Lol i never said i a had a problem with the existing summoner spells. Those dont have a 30 second cooldown and go like at least 3 times the distance of flash. But can imagine having mark on summoners rift. Why would you bother going anyone but an assasin or similar? Not only does it give champions a leblanc jump or noctune ult engage, it buffs those champions further.

If there are no snowballs melee champs will get kited to death or poke to death. Also the snowballs are skillshots so just learn to dodge them and you will be fine or if they snowball into you just use your cc spell on them problem solved.

Kited or poked to death? That was not a big issue with the old aram and the fights actually had some sort of skill rather than an assasin landing a mark on a half health squishy and going in for the insta pop. Even when i play wukong or garen or ali on aram i go wow this is soo overpowered and you can insta pop champs easily. As for dodging them there are some that you just simply cant dodge and thats whats get you.
